name: RunCloudShellCommand
description: Run an environment, resource, or service command in a CloudShell sandbox
author: Quali
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: targetType
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target type: A command on a resource or service within the sandbox, or a top-level environment command

inputs.name: targetPattern
inputs.label: Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of a resource or service in the sandbox where the command should be run, or a regex that matches the name of a single resource or service, e.g. Apache.*

inputs.name: commandName
inputs.label: Command Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Internal name of the command to run, e.g. start_traffic

inputs.name: commandInputs
inputs.label: Command Inputs
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Command inputs, one per line. 

Example:

    Traffic_Duration_Minutes=5
    Load_Type=Video
